name: Gravit Designer Swatch File
summary: Learn about .GVSWATCH files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can load GVSWATCH files in Gravit Designer by selecting the import icon in the swatches panel.

Gravit Designer is typically used for creating social media graphics, presentations, cards, and posters. It is available for download on Windows, macOS, Linux, and Chrome OS platforms. It is also available as a web program that can be used through your web browser, such as Chrome, Edge, Firefox, or Safari.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
